title: Making Ratio More Visible and Helping Users Understand 80/20
description: Enhanced visibility of the 80/20 ratio and provided educational content to help users understand the concept better.
changes: Added a prominent display of the 80/20 ratio on the dashboard
Introduced tooltips and educational pop-ups explaining the 80/20 principle

title: View Toggle & Week Range Selection
description: Added ability to toggle between weekly breakdown and overall summary views, plus configurable week range selection.
changes: Added toggle buttons to switch between Weekly Breakdown and Overall Summary views
Implemented week range selection (4-8 weeks) for chart data
Enhanced chart displays with improved tooltips and data visualization

title: Initial Release
description: First public release of Effortless Eighty.
changes: Basic tracking and analysis of Strava activities
80/20 intensity analysis based on heart rate zones
Strava API integration with secure authentication
